channel.title: [508] Tricky Customs
channel.description:
Im trying to add full PVP customs to my 508 client, which of course Im converting to 508 from a 317 custom.
So far Ive successfully added my morrigans', statius', and vesta's legs & chest pieces, however when I add the head pieces it either makes the whole body disapear or makes the head do a bob moving backwards and forwards.
Can someone help please or atleast post the full pvp set that works for a 508 client =D
Thanks.
